name: Horse. . .
description:
Horse... is my new project, and before you ask why I named it Horse just know all the levels were not created by a Horse... With that out of the way Horse is the most simple game you might ever play it is literally 4 tiles and 4 buttons how simple is that you could probably teach a Horse to play :0

This short 5 minute game will take not much skill not much time and overall is just a boring piece of fun! 

                                                                                                            -AnArtDev
